original_text:
because I stood in great fear of the multitude,
    and the contempt of families terrified me,
    so that I kept silence, and did not go out of doors—
korean_text: 내가 언제 큰 무리와 여러 종족의 수모가 두려워서 대문 밖으로 나가지 못하고 잠잠하였던가

sentences.original_text: because I stood in great fear of the multitude
and the contempt of families terrified me
and did not go out of doors
